description:
The component creates a color block to highlight important information.

You can use both plain text and other visual components inside it.

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/lBobocfj3tyyJo)
properties.content.description: Content of the block with important information.
properties.theme.description:
Determines the block color:

* `info` (default) — Blue.
* `success` — Green.
* `warning` — Yellow.
* `danger` — Red.
